actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the suitability and feasibility of designating Toltec Gorge as a unit of the National Park System.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the feasibility and desirability of designating Tolter Gorge in the States of Colorado and New Mexico as a unit of the National Park System. Requires the Secretary to report the findings of the study to Congress.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study of the suitability and feasibility of designating Toltec Gorge as a unit of the National Park System.
